2517.name: Outside Hangar B
description: You stand outside Hangar B.  This large building extends into the air
very far.  To the east, you see a large guard tower standing, with a few
guards keeping watch.

2515.name: The Guard Tower
description: You stand in the largest Guard Tower of Vector.  From here you can see
the whole fortress layed out before you.  To the west you can see the main
complex of Vector, raising up above the guard tower.  To the southwest you
can see the small courtyard and the buildings there.  To the downward west
you can see the hangars and the Magitek Complex.  To the south, the Magitek
Factory.

2512.name: {ME{mastern {MH{mallway to the {MH{mangers{x
description: You stand at the bottom of a set of stairs.  You can go up, or down.

2556.name: {MM{magitek {MS{mtronghold {MA{mccess {MR{moad{x
description: A small dirt road continues along the emptiness of the fields
surrounding you.  The Fortress of Vector can be seen north, somewhat
on a hill.

2546.name: The Magitek Tunnel to Strife
description: The tunnel here is long and dark.  Only a torch hangs on the wall,
giving off a little scrap of light.  The floor is made from stone, and
along the edges of the wall a little ditch lies, carring the dripping
water away from the tunnel.  The tunnel goes north and south.

2508.name: {MM{magitek {MS{mtronghold {MH{manger {c[{RB{c] {MN{morth{x
description: You stand in the first hangar.  You can see over the whole thing.  What
really catches your eye is row after row of Vectorian Magitek Warriors lined
up, listening to an sargent.  A set of stairs leads down.

2521.name: Guard Post
description: You are on the roadway going in and out of the western side of the
Vectorian Fortress.  You can go north to the hangars and MagTik Facility, or
south to the Eastern Gates.  To the east you see a few guards standing.

2500.name: {ME{mntrance to the {MM{magitek {RA{mrm{Ry {MS{mtronghold{x
description: The Magitek's Facility, the place where the Magitek Army runs, lives and
dwells.  You enter this iron catacomb, which is very dull.  To the north you
see the command's office, and to the south, the bunking area for the Magitek
Warriors.  A hallway extends a bit to the east, and through a door, you can
see a very large building connected here.

2542.name: The Magitek Tunnel to Strife
description: The tunnel here is long and dark.  Only a torch hangs on the wall,
giving off a little scrap of light.  The floor is made from stone, and
along the edges of the wall a little ditch lies, carring the dripping
water away from the tunnel.  The tunnel goes north and south.

2526.name: {MM{magitek {MS{mtronghold {MA{mccess {MR{moad{x
description: You are walking on the East Gate Road, which leads to either the southern
gates on the way out, or the Eastern Gates of Vector.  The road here curves,
going to the west or north.  To the west is the South Gates, to the north
the East Gates.

2502.name: Elite Members Lounge
description: You enter the Member's Lounge, a place to rest, and also used to debrief
people.  On the west wall, you see a large map of the realms, and a desk
infront of it.  The rest of the room is made out of chairs and couches, but
there is also a large table with chairs stacked next to it, to the east.  To
the south, you see a pair of double doors leading into the Bunking Area.

2509.name: {MW{mestern {MH{mallway to the {MH{mangers{x
description: The bottom floor, you can go either east or up.  There is nothing more of
interest here.

2552.name: {MM{magitek {MS{mtronghold {MA{mccess {MR{moad{x
description: A small dirt road continues along the emptiness of the fields
surrounding you.  The Fortress of Vector can be seen north, somewhat
on a hill.

2510.name: {MM{magitek {MS{mtronghold {MH{manger {c[{RA{c] {MS{mouth{x
description: You walk out into the first hanger.  Here soilder after warrior stands
doing drills, and taking instructions.  There has to be at least 500 people
stands in perfect format, listening to the sargent.  To the rear of the
complex you see people on mats, practising and fighting.  To the south a
large door leading to the outside stands.  To the east, is a door leading
into another hangar.

2554.name: {MM{magitek {MS{mtronghold {MA{mccess {MR{moad{x
description: A small dirt road continues along the emptiness of the fields
surrounding you.  The Fortress of Vector can be seen north, somewhat
on a hill.

2534.name: The Meeting Room Of The Magitek

2507.name: {MW{mestern {MH{mallway to the {MH{mangers{x
description: You are walking in a small iron hallway that leads to the large hanger or
Magitek Warrior Facility.  A large door is open to the east, leading into
the hangars.

2505.name: The Shower Room
description: You stand in the Shower Room.  This room is filled with naked people and
hot running water....  A Magitek Warrior drops a bar of soup, and everyone
just stares...  He doesn't bend over...

2518.name: Between The Hangar
description: You stand between the tower hangers.  To the south you see some grass,
and a large road leading out of this part of Vector.  Some MagiTek Warriors
stand here smoking, and some are just standing place a game of cards.  The
road goes south.

2523.name: {MM{magitek {MS{mtronghold {MA{mccess {MR{moad{x
description: You are walking on the East Gate Road, which leads to either the southern
gates on the way out, or the Eastern Gates of Vector.

2548.name: The Magitek Tunnel to Strife
description: The tunnel here is long and dark.  Only a torch hangs on the wall,
giving off a little scrap of light.  The floor is made from stone, and
along the edges of the wall a little ditch lies, carring the dripping
water away from the tunnel.  The tunnel goes north and south.

2555.name: {MM{magitek {MS{mtronghold {MA{mccess {MR{moad{x
description: A small dirt road continues along the emptiness of the fields
surrounding you.  The Fortress of Vector can be seen north, somewhat
on a hill.

2504.name: The Locker Room
description: You walk into another bare room, except for a ton of lockers.  Row after
row of lockers are here, lined up next to each other.  Between each row, a
bench extends the same length as the lockers themselves.  To the east, a
large iron door leads into an unknown place.  To the north, a open doorway
leads into a very steamy room.

2551.name: {MM{magitek {MS{mtronghold {MA{mccess {MR{moad{x
description: A small dirt road continues along the emptiness of the fields
surrounding you.  The Fortress of Vector can be seen north, somewhat
on a hill.

2516.name: Outside Hangar A
description: You stand outside Hangar A.  This large building extends into the air
very far.  To the east, you see a large guard tower standing, with a few
guards keeping watch.

2513.name: Deck 2B Of The Hangar
description: From this point you get a good view of the MagiTek Armor hangar.  You can
see the beasts standing, hooked up to there hoses, awaiting a driving.  The
stairs continue up.

2503.name: The Bunking Area
description: You enter a very large room.  Row after row of bunk beds are against
either wall.  Each bunk bed holds a wide variety of diffrent nic-nacs and
personal items.  Magitek Warriors sit on the beds, or sit at the tables in
the walkway, playing a game of cards.  A door leads off to the east.

2541.name: The Magitek Tunnel to Strife
description: The tunnel here is long and dark.  Only a torch hangs on the wall,
giving off a little scrap of light.  The floor is made from stone, and
along the edges of the wall a little ditch lies, carring the dripping
water away from the tunnel.  The tunnel goes north and south.

2525.name: {MM{magitek {MS{mtronghold {MA{mccess {MR{moad{x
description: You are walking on the East Gate Road, which leads to either the southern
gates on the way out, or the Eastern Gates of Vector.

2506.name: The Arms Room
description: You walk into a anarchist's paradise.  The walls and floors are covered
in nothing but diffrent weapons, and crates of explosives.  A large sign on
the wall says "Do Not Smoke".

2527.name: {MM{magitek {MS{mtronghold {MA{mccess {MR{moad{x
description: To the west is the South Gates.  To the east is the Eastern Gates of
Vector.  Some MagTik Warriors walk along the walls.

2549.name: The Magitek Tunnel to Strife
description: The tunnel here is long and dark.  Only a torch hangs on the wall,
giving off a little scrap of light.  The floor is made from stone, and
along the edges of the wall a little ditch lies, carring the dripping
water away from the tunnel A ladder leads upwards to the above
grounds.

2511.name: {MM{magitek {MS{mtronghold {MH{manger {c[{RB{c] {MS{mouth{x
description: You walk into a room of machinery.  Large iron beasts stand, hooked up to
hoses and sitting still in here.  Men in black coats walk around with clip
boards watching the beasts, studing the beasts.  The rest of the hangar is
made up of boxes and crates, holding unknown items.

2520.name: The Roadway
description: You are on the roadway going in and out of the western side of the
Vectorian Fortress.  You can go north to the hangars and MagTik Facility, or
south to the Eastern Gates.

2533.name: The Main Hall Of The Magitek

2550.name: {MM{magitek {MS{mtronghold {MA{mccess {MR{moad{x
description: A small dirt road continues along the emptiness of the fields
surrounding you.  The Fortress of Vector can be seen north, somewhat
on a hill.

2545.name: The Magitek Tunnel to Strife
description: The tunnel here is long and dark.  Only a torch hangs on the wall,
giving off a little scrap of light.  The floor is made from stone, and
along the edges of the wall a little ditch lies, carring the dripping
water away from the tunnel.  The tunnel goes north and south.

2514.name: To The Guard Tower
description: You are now walking in a small tunnel, which is where this ladder goes
up.  The tunnel continues up, into a guard tower.

2519.name: The Roadway
description: You are on the roadway going in and out of the western side of the
Vectorian Fortress.  You can go north to the hangars and MagTik Facility, or
south to the Eastern Gates.

2528.name: The Portal Room
description: EAST: Portal To Zozo
NORTH: Near NEW THALOS
SOUTH: The Vectorian Titan Valley Base

2557.name: {MM{magitek {MS{mtronghold {MA{mccess {MR{moad{x
description: A small dirt road continues along the emptiness of the fields
surrounding you.  The Fortress of Vector can be seen north, somewhat
on a hill.

2543.name: The Magitek Tunnel to Strife
description: The tunnel here is long and dark.  Only a torch hangs on the wall,
giving off a little scrap of light.  The floor is made from stone, and
along the edges of the wall a little ditch lies, carring the dripping
water away from the tunnel.  The tunnel goes north and south.

2524.name: {MM{magitek {MS{mtronghold {MA{mccess {MR{moad{x
description: You are walking on the East Gate Road, which leads to either the southern
gates on the way out, or the Eastern Gates of Vector.

2522.name: {MT{mhe {ME{mast {MG{mates {MO{mf {MV{mector{x
description: You stand at the Eastern Gates Of Vector.  Several Guards stand here on
watch.  They are armed to the teeth.  The gates stand above you, made from
iron, and closed very tightly.  To the south, a road leads along the wall of
Vector.

2529.name: {MM{magitek {MS{mtronghold {MA{mccess {MR{moad{x
description: A small dirt road continues along the emptiness of the fields
surrounding you.  The Fortress of Vector can be seen north, somewhat
on a hill.

2553.name: {MM{magitek {MS{mtronghold {MA{mccess {MR{moad{x
description: A small dirt road continues along the emptiness of the fields
surrounding you.  The Fortress of Vector can be seen north, somewhat
on a hill.

2501.name: Command's Office
description: You step into the Commander's Office.  The office is very messy, with
papers and books stacked all around.  On the walls you see plans for the new
Magitek Armor, a type of device that seems to run on Espers.  Ganon's name
appears at the bottom.  A desk stands in the middle, also cluttered with
stuff, that is really all that is in here.

2544.name: The Magitek Tunnel to Strife
description: The tunnel here is long and dark.  Only a torch hangs on the wall,
giving off a little scrap of light.  The floor is made from stone, and
along the edges of the wall a little ditch lies, carring the dripping
water away from the tunnel.  The tunnel goes north and south.

2547.name: The Magitek Tunnel to Strife
description: The tunnel here is long and dark.  Only a torch hangs on the wall,
giving off a little scrap of light.  The floor is made from stone, and
along the edges of the wall a little ditch lies, carring the dripping
water away from the tunnel.  The tunnel goes north and south.

2522.name: The MagiTek East Gate Guard~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M grall 2503 100~
2522.room_name: A MagiTek Guard stands here keeping watch.

2500.name: The Vectorian Guard~
description:
You can get into the Fortress Of Vector by this guard.
Just say in all lower case letters 'entrance please'
and you should be transfered there. Be sure to be visable.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M speech 2504 entrance please~

2501.name: the punching bag~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
2501.room_name: A Punching Bag hangs in one corner of the locker room...

2502.name: A MagiTek Mage~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
2502.room_name: A MagiTek mage stands here, casting spells on his fellow warriors.

2506.name: the shopkeeper of the MagiTek~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M grall 2506 100~
2506.room_name: A man stands here, selling items to the other MagiTek members.

2509.name: A Member Of The {MM{magiTek {MA{mrmy{x~
description:
Before you stands the MagiTek Solder, First Class.  They are
dressed in the MagiTek's Best armor, made from lightweight rough iron.
The weapons they carry are swords with magicite blades.  They glare at
you, watching your every move.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M speech 2509 follow me boys~
2509.room_name: A Member Of The {MM{magiTek {MA{mrmy{x stands here, on duty.

2510.name: MagiTek Armor~
description:
Before you stands a large, steam breathing beast.  Riding ontop of it,
and inside it, a Vectorian Soldier.  The best stands very tall, on two legs.
A gapping mouth stands, made from iron.  The beast stands here, it all its
mighty, ready to destory anything that gets in its way.
subroutines:
M give 2511 quetok~
M speech 2509 follow me boys~
M grall 2501 100~
2510.room_name: A large, iron beast, stands here, ready to destroy all.
